upgrades.name: Force Push
upgrades.text: >Choose an enemy Trooper unit within RANGE 1 of this unit. The chosen unit makes a Speed-1 Move, even if it is Engaged. You resolve this Move.

upgrades.name: Force Reflexes
upgrades.text: Gain a dodge token; exhaust after use.

upgrades.name: Anger
upgrades.text: When this unit suffers 1 or more Wounds, after the effect is reolved, it gains 1 Aim Token.

upgrades.name: Burst of Speed
upgrades.text: At the start of this unit's Activation, you may EXPEND this card to treat this unit's maximum Speed as 3 until the end of the Round. If you do, during the End Phase, this unit gains 1 Immobilize token.
